ai-cp19:1.1_0: In the city they stood still,
ai-cp19:1.4_0: well-spoken and has gone to ethical conduct.
ai-cp19:2.2_0: Ethical conduct is easy to admonish,
ai-cp19:3.2_0: I went to my guest house.
ai-cp19:3.3_0: You’ve journeyed the panels of my father;
ai-cp19:5.2_0: having laid down my mind again,
ai-cp19:6.2_0: don’t think this is the supreme person.
ai-cp19:6.4_0: this one will return to my presence.’
ai-cp19:7.1_0: I paid homage at her mother and father,
ai-cp19:7.4_0: as I went to a house.
ai-cp19:8.1_0: When it has come to the end,
ai-cp19:8.4_0: as well as a little bird.
ai-cp19:9.2_0: I don’t teach them the Dhamma.
ai-cp19:10.1_0: ‘Please, sirs, is the fire of those great fires,
ai-cp19:10.4_0: I’m a father of me, my father!’
ai-cp19:11.1_0: Such is the cause, this is the reason for this—
ai-cp19:11.3_0: I gave him the going forth,
ai-cp19:12.1_0: And the ninth person is not able to wise.
